meta.title: Web UI Automtion Smoke Test - TestRail

a.tooltip-text: Add Test Case by creating a new Test Suite or opening an existing one from the sidebar.
To add a Test Run, create a new Test Case or open an existing one from the sidebar.

div.title: Press Ctrl+Shift+F to open search dialog

a.p: C16346 - Over 18 user can book an appointment while uploading a file during answering the triage answers
C16345 - Primary user can book an appointment for under 18 while uploading a file during answering the triage answers
R3648 - Web UI Automtion Smoke Test
C46269 - Check the Sign-in behavior within 30 minutes after the account has been locked.
C46258 - Check the Sign In behavior after more than 5 unsuccessful attempts.

a.tooltip-text: Subscribe to Gurock's newsletter to receive TestRail updates in your inbox.
Follow TestRail on LinkedIn for relevant TestRail updates.
Subscribe TestRail on Youtube for relevant TestRail updates.

div.p: Set up collaborative review and approval processes with the TestRail Enterprise plan. Learn how to ensure cases are accurately defined here.
D

a.onclick: this.blur(); App.Dialogs.remove('This action will permanently delete the selected attachment(s) and all their instances across your projects (except those on closed Test Runs & Plans). This cannot be undone, and deleted attachments won\'t be recoverable via restores. Do you wish to continue?', null, null, null, function() { App.Attachments.removeAttachments(); }, null);; return false;

div.style: margin-top: 40px; clear: both; background-color: white; height: 361px; overflow-y: auto;

div.p:
Created by Automation Engineer on 9/11/2025.
References
Test Runs

a.tooltip-text: Subscribe to receive emails on test changes for this test run.
Unsubscribe from email updates on test changes for this test run.
Exports this test run into different formats (XML, Excel/CSV).
Opens a print view of this test run.

a.class: toolbar-button toolbar-button-last content-header-button button-responsive button-report dropdownLink

li.tooltip-text: Shows a summary of found defects for this test run.
Shows a summary of found defects for this test run per test case & test.
Shows a summary of found defects for the references (requirements, user stories, etc.) in this test run.
Shows the results in this test run per test case (result coverage & comparison).
Shows the results for the references (requirements, user stories, etc.) in this test run (result coverage & comparison).
Shows the distribution and groups for a specific test attribute (e.g. priority, type or status) for this test run.
Shows a full summary & overview of this test run with statistics as well as activity and progress details.
Shows the workload summary, estimates and forecasts for users in this test run.
Submit a new defect to your external tool.
Go to your external tool to create a new defect.

button.class: button button-left button-positive button-disabled button-ok-disabled button-dark

a.class: button button-left button-negative button-cancel button-dark dialog-action-close

input.name: addCommentComment
input.div: Add a new comment to this test.
Edit your comment to this test.
Add a comment for the tester.
Edit your comment for the tester.

div.onclick: this.blur(); App.Attachments.entityRemoveAttachmentsDialog('This deletes selected instances of your attachments. The files will keep on being stored on your Library. Go to Attachments on Data Storage to delete permanently.', '1', 'test_change', '#entityAttachmentListWrapper-c93cbabf-5cdb-42a4-918b-e9bb350d3850', '', '#addCommentAttachments', null); return false;

div.span: Drop files here to attach, or click on "+" to browse

div.onclick: this.blur(); App.Attachments.entityRemoveAttachmentsDialog('This deletes selected instances of your attachments. The files will keep on being stored on your Library. Go to Attachments on Data Storage to delete permanently.', '1', 'test_change', '#entityAttachmentListWrapper-c93cbabf-5cdb-42a4-918b-e9bb350d3850', '', '#addCommentAttachments', null); return false;

span.style: position: relative; text-align: left; line-height: normal; display: inline-block; zoom: 1; vertical-align: middle; font-weight: normal; font-variant: normal; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: none; direction: ltr; transform: none; width: 100%; height: 100%;

svg.style: overflow: hidden; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); user-select: none; cursor: default; vertical-align: middle; position: relative; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

g.style: font-family: "Source Sans Pro"; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;
border-radius: 0px; font-family: "Source Sans Pro"; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;

div.style: left: auto; top: 0px; padding: 5px 3px; border: 1px solid rgb(100, 100, 100); margin: 0px; outline: none; position: absolute; z-index: 50; right: auto; overflow: hidden; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); box-shadow: rgb(153, 153, 153) 2px 2px 5px; display: none;

color: rgb(90, 90, 90); padding: 6px; font-size: 14px; overflow: hidden; border-width: 1px; border-color: rgb(225, 225, 225); white-space: nowrap; position: absolute; border-style: solid; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); user-select: none; top: 0px; left: 0px; visibility: hidden; pointer-events: none; box-shadow: none; border-radius: 2px; font-family: "Source Sans Pro";

a.tooltip-text: Remove filter and show all tests.

div.label: Select label
div.div: The selected and/or created labels will be applied to the selected test. You can also edit label selections over the tests list.

a.tooltip-text: Assigns all selected tests to a user.
Assigns all tests of the test run to the selected user, respecting the current filter.

div.p: The statistics represent the visible tests of this group only (including filters and page limits). The numbers may vary for the entire group.

div.div: You need to select at least one section (or include all sections).
You need to select at least one column to export.
You can select multiple sections by holding Ctrl/Cmd on your keyboard.

select.name: exportCsvLayout
select.option: Export latest results only (one line per test)
Export all results and comments (multiple lines per test)

div.label: Include separator hint for maximum Excel compatibility
Include separated steps on separate rows
Column *
div.div: Select the column to add to the tables.

div.p: Include tests of the following previous status:

div.label: User *
div.div: Select a user to assign the tests.

div.p: The Results & Comments tab shows the results, comments and assignments for the current test in this run in chronological order.

The History & Context tab shows all related tests over time (all tests of the same test case). This can include related tests of other configurations in the same test plan or past test runs. The current test in this run is highlighted.
A line chart at the top displays recent and related test results with the recorded statuses.
The Defects tab shows all logged defects for related tests over time (all defects of the same test case). Defects of the current test in this run are highlighted.

div.div: You can select a different group or change the filters.

a.class: button button-ok button-ok-disabled button-left button-positive button-disabled dialog-action-default
button button-left button-positive button-disabled button-hidden button-no-margin-right dialog-action-secondary
